name: ls-it
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 https://frigo.io 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 https://frigo.io wss://frigo.io; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:;font-src https://fonts.gstatic.com;
